group.name: wizard
group.item: The parameter value wizard allows to specify constant values for the entry parameters of the node you have just created. If you do not wish to provide any values now, cancel the dialog by pressing ESC. You can supply values to a parameter at a later time using a data link (dynamic parameter value) or by editing the parameter expression in the property browser.

group.name: wizard.node-settings
group.item:
The node you just created has various settings associated with it, which can be adjusted on this page.
You can also adjust the settings at a later time by selecting the node and editing the settings in the property browser.
